ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ tè gẅiin ntoŋ lécúa múɔ wɔɔn wɔ́.
en: You are not right to hit this child.
It is the one who calls you to confide in you who knows where you will stand.

ngiemboon: Mentoŋ ngesáŋ kéen ḿbú ńkyɛ́ʼte tsẅɛ.
en: The cornflowers have all spread out.
clean the dirt out of one’s ears

ngiemboon: À kéen sɔg mesoŋ mé mie é kɔ́ɔn síŋe tà é fʉ̀ʼɔɔn éfɔ́gɔ lê tɔ́d.
en: He cleaned his teeth which were dirty so that they are very white now.
